title: Mac 6.6 Game Crash
body: Am I the only one here with mac that has a continuous game crash since yesterday midnight? I literally played a game till 10:30 ish, but like an hour later, the client does not allow me to spectate nor play a single game. Anybody has a same problem like me? I updated my os to newest version, and I did redownloaded the game several times.

replies.body: I've had to stop playing ranked because of the frames drops, lag, and audio problems that are consistently occuring on the MAC client while on Summoner's Rift. I sincerely hope all the issues in the thread are resolved sooner than later.

I have had the same issue swell:/ Not sure how to solve the problem... but prior to midnight last night I was having constant audio problems within the game that would cause an occasional lag.... I didn't play a game past midnight... but today when i started a ranked game at 30 ping, my screen froze at the loading section... I now have a loss for a ranked game and several penalties....:/

This happened to me as well. It started 2 days ago when i noticed my sound was off and and then everyone on my team disconnected. I played several games without a crash and then about 20 min ago I attempted to play a ranked game and it continuously crashed throughout the game.

Why isn't this problem for mac users getting more help? Ive been dealing with it by turning off the sound but its getting more and more irritating the more i cant hear the actual game. its obviously not our macs if its every persons mac having the same issue which is what Riot thought it might be when I put in the ticket but thats literally saying every person who uses mac got a problem on it as soon as Patch 6.6 came out and that would be way too big of a coincidence. Please Riot, check whats going with the mac client, its not just 2 or 3 people.

- Massive FPS Drops when sound is on

Are you getting any specific errors?  We've noticed an increase in reports of Mac FPS issues this patch, but haven't seen anything in particular yet about game crashes.

I'd recommend starting with the steps on our [Bug Splat/Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#section-mac) article and go through the steps there to see if they help.

The fix that Gutzzs suggested [over here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/lqULUkOP-patch-66-mac-sound-issue-fix) (switch "Theme Music" to "Classic") has worked for me; perhaps that's a place to look for a permanent fix? Thanks

Same problems here. Started with audio issues and FPS drops in team fights. I tried playing with no sound which was supposed to "solve" the problem, but that only worked for two games. After that I was getting even worse FPS drops, bug splats and consistently disconnected.

RITO: FIX YOUR MAC CLIENT PLEASE!!!!!
